    Edge Case: Invalid syntax highlight languages

    less than 1 minute read

    Good highlighting:

    str = ARGV.first
if str
  str = str.b[/\A_(.*)_\z/, 1]
  if str and Gem::Version.correct?(str)
    version = str
    ARGV.shift
  end
end

    Good (but dumb) highlighting:

    str = ARGV.first
if str
  str = str.b[/\A_(.*)_\z/, 1]
  if str and Gem::Version.correct?(str)
    version = str
    ARGV.shift
  end
end

    Bad highlighting:

    str = ARGV.first
if str
  str = str.b[/\A_(.*)_\z/, 1]
  if str and Gem::Version.correct?(str)
    version = str
    ARGV.shift
  end
end

    Tags: content, css, edge case

    Categories: docs, Edge Case, minimal-mistakes

    Updated: October 6, 2009
